question: give me the capital of russia
answer: The capital of Russia is Moscow. It is the most populous city in Russia, with a population of over 12 million people as of 2021. Moscow serves as the political, economic, cultural, and educational center of Russia. It is located on the Moskva River in western Russia and is one of the oldest cities in the country, founded around 1147. The city spans an area of 2,511 square kilometers (969 square miles) within the Moscow Oblast (region).
